name: A killer-for-hire who lurks in the shadows, then strikes with concealed weapons drawn in an instant.
A disciplined fighter who trains in both hand-to-hand combat and with various weapons.
A muscular thug who recognizes that his physique is his greatest asset; he uses heavy weapons.
A deadly dancer in battle who sprints between skirmishes with an unpredictable weapon.
A nimble noble who is courteous to a fault, unless dishonoredâ€¦ then a duel is called for.
A cautious defender who prefers to use polearms and shields to keep foes at bay.
A tireless tracker who stalks prey through the wild before striking with a so-called "primitive" weapon.
A cackling comedian who gauges his foes at a distance before hurling an arsenal of thrown weapons.
A quiet, calm sniper who is skilled with all forms of projectile weaponry, and uses it to great effect.
A humble warrior who seeks a balanced approach to mastering the blade.
